div.div: melting with thirst associated with stomach depletion

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: melting with thirst associated with stomach depletion

sense.def: Pathological Condition of the depletion variant of zhong xiao 中消 , central melting. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yang 羊 quotes Gu jin lu yan Recipe book. Tang era, ca. 7th century. 古今錄驗 : 胃虛消渴：羊肚爛煮，空腹食之 , “ Melting with thirst associated with stomach depletion : thoroughly boil a lamb stomach, and consume on an empty abdomen”.
